metadata.title: CVE-2015-7632 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.252 and 19.x before19.0.0.207 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.535 on Linux, Adobe AIRbefore 19.0.0.213, Adobe AIR SDK before 19.0.0.213, and Adobe AIR SDK &Compiler before 19.0.0.213 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via aLoader object with a crafted loaderBytes property.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7632` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.535ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.535ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.535ubuntu0.14.04.1').
